benchmark_details.name: TextStarCraft II
benchmark_details.overview: TextStarCraft II is a specialized environment for assessing Large Language Models (LLMs) in real-time strategic scenarios within StarCraft II, directly addressing the lack of benchmarks for evaluating LLMs' capabilities in real-time decision-making and long-term planning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the real-time strategy decision-making capabilities of Large Language Models in the context of StarCraft II.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The reliance on non-visual data inputs and the use of scripted micro policies could restrict the diversity of AI strategies available.

data.source: TextStarCraft II framework using the python-sc2 interface.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on game performance, comparing agent effectiveness against built-in StarCraft II AI.
methodology.interpretation: Higher win rates and better resource utilization indicate effective strategy execution by LLMs.
methodology.validation: Validation procedures include testing against built-in AI at varying difficulty levels.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Participants were fully briefed on the nature of the tests and provided their voluntary consent.
